mcwifipnp.gui.port.invalid:
Not a valid port.
Must be a number between §41024 and 65535§f.
mcwifipnp.gui.players.info: The maximum number of players that the server can host.
mcwifipnp.gui.motd.info: The server information displayed below the name in the multiplayer server list.
mcwifipnp.gui.AllPlayersCheats.info: Give a player permission to use administrative commands when joining the server. Alternatively, use /op to make someone an operator.
mcwifipnp.gui.Whitelist.info: Enforce whitelist. Once enabled, only whitelisted players may join. Use /whitelist to add players to the list.
mcwifipnp.gui.OnlineMode.info: Whether to let the server compare and verify the login information against the Mojang server database.
mcwifipnp.gui.OnlineMode.online.info: Only allow players with valid Microsoft/Mojang accounts to join the LAN server.
mcwifipnp.gui.OnlineMode.offline.info: Allow anyone to join the LAN server, including offline players.
mcwifipnp.gui.OnlineMode.fixuuid.info:
Allow anyone to join the LAN server. Players with valid Microsoft/Mojang accounts will use their unique genuine UUID. 
§bUse this mode if you are migrating from the online mode and want to retain the inventories.
mcwifipnp.gui.PvP.info: Note: disabling PvP will also prevent you from taking damage from your own projectiles.
mcwifipnp.gui.UseUPnP.info: Use UPnP to setup port forwarding and broadcast the game server on LAN with UPnP so that people on the same LAN can find us directly.
mcwifipnp.gui.CopyIP.info: Get the §bPublic IP§f and allow you to copy it to clipboard
mcwifipnp.upnp.clipboard: Successfully got %s, Due to factors such as NAT, these IPs may still not be able to connect directly.
mcwifipnp.upnp.cantgetip: Couldn't get public IP! Please check your network settings. Your IPv4 may contain multiple NATs or you do not have IPv6.
mcwifipnp.upnp.failed.mapped: Unable to forward port %s: Port was already mapped by another UPnP service, Please change the port number.
mcwifipnp.upnp.failed.disabled: Unable to forward port %s: UPnP is not enabled on your router, You may need to use port mapping software.
mcwifipnp.upnp.failed.unknownerror: Unable to forward port %s: Unknown error while adding port mapping, Please use a port mapping software.
mcwifipnp.commands.forceoffline.add.fail: Player is already in the force offline list
mcwifipnp.commands.forceoffline.add.succ: Added %s to the force offline list
mcwifipnp.commands.forceoffline.list: There are %s players in the force offline list: %s
mcwifipnp.commands.forceoffline.none: There are no players in the force offline list
mcwifipnp.commands.forceoffline.remove.f: Player is not in the force offline list
mcwifipnp.commands.forceoffline.remove.s: Removed %s from the force offline list
